documentation.description: Create or update a query rule

ruleset_id.description: The unique identifier of the ruleset this rule should be added to. The ruleset will be created if it does not exist.

rule_id.description: The unique identifier of the rule to be created or updated.

body.description: The query rule configuration, including the type of rule, the criteria to match the rule, and the action that should be taken if the rule matches.
